feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Quotas
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Quotas

entry.content: Folder level and organization level support for the quota adjuster feature is available in Preview through the Google Cloud console, the Cloud Quotas API (/docs/quotas/reference/rest/v1beta/projects.locations.quotaAdjusterSettings), gcloud quotas beta CLI, Terraform, and Cloud Client Libraries. For more information, see the documentation about how to enable the quota adjuster through the Cloud Quotas API.
entry.summary: The quota adjuster feature, which helps manage resource quotas, is now available in Preview for folder and organization levels. You can access this new functionality through the Google Cloud console, Cloud Quotas API, gcloud CLI, Terraform, and Cloud Client Libraries. This expansion allows for more granular control over quota management across your cloud resources.
entry.title: Feature: Quota adjuster now supports folders and organizations
